titleStmt.title: Clods carroll: or, A proper new iigg to be sung dialogue wise, of a man and a woman that would needs be married. To a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A. M[athewes] for Henry Gosson,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and suggested publication date from STC.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
